metadata.title: CVE-2020-9760 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in WeeChat before 2.7.1 (0.3.4 to 2.7 are affected). When a new IRC message 005 is received with longer nick prefixes, a buffer overflow and possibly a crash can happen when a new mode is set for a nick.

criterions.comment: weechat package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
